name: Little Einar Demo
detailed_description: This demo contains the first two levels of Little Einar!
about_the_game: This demo contains the first two levels of Little Einar!
short_description: A Demo of the first two levels

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070
